description: This file implements the ProviderDelegate class for handling provider registration, invocation, responses, errors, notifications, and cleanup within a WPEFramework plugin. It manages external dependencies such as request/response handling, provider registry, and transaction registry, and processes JSON payloads for various provider-related operations.

classes.name: ProviderDelegate
classes.description: A class managing provider registration, invocation, response handling, and cleanup within the plugin framework.

methods.name: Core::hresult HandleAppGatewayRequest(const Exchange::GatewayContext & context,const string & method,const string & payload,const string & origin,string & result)
methods.description: Main handler for processing incoming gateway requests directed at providers.

methods.name: Core::hresult RegisterProvider(const ProviderContext & context,const string & capability,const bool & provide,string & result)
methods.description: Registers or deregisters a provider capability for a given context.

methods.name: Core::hresult InvokeProvider(const ProviderContext & context,const string & capability,const JsonObject & params,string & result)
methods.description: Invokes a provider with specified capabilities and parameters.

methods.name: Core::hresult HandleProviderResponse(const JsonObject & params,string & result)
methods.description: Handles responses from providers, correlating them with original requests.

methods.name: Core::hresult HandleProviderError(const JsonObject & params,string & result)
methods.description: Handles error messages from providers, matching them with original requests.

methods.name: Core::hresult HandleProviderNotification(const string & capability,const JsonObject & params,string & result)
void Cleanup(const uint32_t connectionId,const string & origin)
methods.description: Performs cleanup of registry entries related to a connection and origin.

methods.name: bool ExtractAdditionalContext(const string & payload,JAdditionalProviderContext & additionalContext)
methods.description: Extracts and validates additional context from payload JSON.

methods.name: ProviderMethodType GetType(const std::string & typeStr)
methods.description: Converts a string provider type to its enum representation.

methods.name: void BrokerProvider(const ProviderContext & context,const ProviderContext & providerContext,const JsonObject paramsObject)
methods.description: Dispatches a provider call, correlating requests and responses.

methods.name: bool ExtractCorrelationIdAndKey(const JsonObject & object,const string & key,string & correlationId,string & result)
methods.description: Extracts correlation ID and response data from JSON objects.

ctags.name: BrokerProvider
ctags.signature: (const ProviderContext & context,const ProviderContext & providerContext,const JsonObject paramsObject)
